body:
A permanent with a 'When SN becomes the target of a spell or ability' trigger doesn't trigger if it becomes the target of a triggered ability.

An example with two new cards:

Tethered Skite blocks a Karplusan Wolverine. The triggered ability of Karplusan Wolverine targets the Tethered Skite. Tethered Skite's triggered ability doesn't trigger.
author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)
title: Targeted triggered abilities not triggering 'when target of spell or ability'

comments.body: It's Skirge, not Skite - and only for purely scripted cards
